DOC.brief_title: Ultrasonographic Hormonal Characteristics Malawian Women With Without Obstetric Fistula
DOC.detailed_description: This study cross-sectional study 110 Malawian woman present medical evaluation Fistula Care Centre Lilongwe , Malawi . If woman enroll study , demographic , medical history , physical exam , lab data abstract medical record Fistula Centre . She also pelvic ultrasound participant characteristic cervix , uterus , ovary ( cervical length , endometrial thickness ovarian volume ) evaluate . If participant obstetric fistula , also complete additional blood draw lab test . The laboratory test evaluate three hormone associate amenorrhea infertility : follicle stimulate hormone , estradiol , antimullerian hormone .
